trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_SEQ_00<tab>Vorsaile believes it past time you were issued a personal chocobo.

TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_SEQ_01<tab>To obtain your personal chocobo, you must present Cingur with a Serpent Chocobo Issuance. This document can be obtained by exchanging company seals with the serpent quartermaster. Here's hoping you have been setting aside your seals...
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_SEQ_02<tab>Cingur brings you your bird, and it is love at first sight. Name your new companion, and make it official.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_SEQ_03<tab>After much deliberation, you decide on a name worthy of the noblest steed. Inform Cingur to complete the last of the formalities.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_SEQ_04<tab>And so begins the adventures of <var 29 EB02 /var> and <var 29 EB38 /var>. May their friendship last for eternity!
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_TODO_00<tab>Present a Serpent Chocobo Issuance to Cingur.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_TODO_01<tab>Name your chocobo.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cingur.

TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Vorsaile_000<tab>Ah, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I understand you have been working tirelessly in Gridania's name. You are truly an example to your fellow Serpents.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Vorsaile_001<tab>But tell me, have you ever felt as though you couldn't get to your destination quickly enough? That perhaps you could do with a swifter pair of legs?

TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Vorsaile_002<tab>If so, you might consider getting a personal chocobo. You have yet to be issued your own bird, am I correct? Given your considerable talents, you should be able to obtain one in no time at all. Let me tell you how to go about it.

TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Vorsaile_003<tab>First, you must obtain a Serpent Chocobo Issuance by exchanging company seals with the quartermaster. Once you have this deed, present it to our man Cingur, and he will furnish you with a suitable bird.

TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Vorsaile_010<tab>To be issued a personal chocobo, you must first obtain a Serpent Chocobo Issuance by exchanging company seals with the quartermaster. Once you have this deed, present it to our man Cingur, and he will furnish you with a suitable bird.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_000<tab>Want a bird issued, you say? Then I'll need to see your Serpent Chocobo Issuance.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_010<tab>Yes, everything appears to be in order.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_011<tab>A moment please. I'll be right back with your chocobo.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_012<tab>And here he is! The fellow has been in high spirits the past few bells. He must have sensed that his master was coming!
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_013<tab>Now then, to make it official, you'll want to give your noble steed a name.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_020<tab>Want a bird issued, you say? Then I'll need to see your Serpent Chocobo Issuance. You can get one from the serpent quartermaster, over at the Adders' Nest.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_021<tab>Of course, you will need to exchange Serpent Seals for it. You can earn these by completing tasks for the Order of the Twin Adder, Gridania's Grand Company.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_CHOCOBO_000<tab>Kweh!
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_030<tab>Now then, to make it official, you'll want to give your noble steed a name.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_040<tab>Heh heh! I daresay he likes his name!
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_041<tab>Here is your very own chocobo whistle. Simply blow into it, and your feathered friend will come bounding to your side.

TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_042<tab>But do forgive him if he doesn't respond when summoned in crowded city areas or monster-infested lairs. Chocobos are stout-hearted creatures, but they have their limits.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_043<tab>And lastly, I present you with your chocobo rider's license, as is required by law.
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_Cingur_044<tab>And that concludes all the formalities! I wish you and your chocobo long years of fulfilling companionship!
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_CHOCOBO_PROMPT_TITLE<tab>Name Your Chocobo
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_CHOCOBO_PROMPT_CAPTION<tab>Name
TEXT_SUBFST120_00700_CHOCOBO_PROMPT_MES0<tab>Names must be between 2 and 20 alphabetic characters.
